title: Game randomly crashing and small bugs happening throughout pre-game lobby
body:
Lately since around mid 6.14 i have been experiencing my game randomly crashing from time to time, (Clicking hextech crafting menu, Loading into games, creating custom games)

I have also been experiencing where when i load into a game after clicking join when the queue pops, my screen stays all black besides the boxes around the champions and my mastery and rune page selection, during this i am unable to change my  summoner spells or type into game chat.

Is this happening to anybody else or is it just me?

If so could anyone tell me how to fix this problem please.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This might be related to a known issue that was affecting some players recently, this has since been fixed though afaik.

Are you still experiencing this issue?

Could you run through the [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for me, let me know if anything helps.

Apologies for the delayed response.
